text: ane je pote potane nasrani kahe che ame te'o pasethi pana vacana lidhum, te'o pana teno moto bhaga bhulavi betha, jeni sikhamana te'one apavamam avi hati, to ame pana te'oni andaro andara kapata ane satruta nakhi didhi, je kayamata sudhi rahese ane je kami pana a loko karata hata najika manja allaha ta'ala te'one badhum ja batavi dese
